column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat has that wow feeling when you walk in.  High energy
column2: fun decor.  It's like a tasteful Ed Debevics. And
column3: we felt we were lucky to get a spot at the counter in the back where we could watch all of the food come out.  We had high expectations for the food not just because it is a Stephanie Izard creation
column4: but also because each of the food items are so creatively assembled.  And
column6: there is no substitution allowed -- it's american cheese on that patty melt
